MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
One weekend night,
I found myself summoned by Bourse again.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Good evening. I am Bourse, the night captain of the Verforet Military Police. Tonight, I'd like to visit Vivi's room.

Officers, it's this girl!
Catch her, please.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm not going to do anything bad. I'm just going to slip the Sultry Bomber negligee and babydoll slip we bought the other day into Vivi's closet as a nice surprise.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
And it's not just a matter of placing them neatly in the closet.
I'm going to put them on this life-sized Vivi doll.

That's terrifying!
It's like something out of a horror movie!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's OK. Vivi won't be that surprised. She's the type who'd find it funny, hug me, and then punch me out for getting the better of her.

Ah, right.
That's actually a pretty good way of describing her.
I don't think it's right for a captain or conductor to sneak into her room. Though I'll admit it's an interesting plan that'd be fun to try out.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Conductor, it's easy to tell how you really feel about this. I like that about you, though. I'm sure Vivi will forgive you.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I know you'll do this for me. I just know it!
It's OK to misbehave, but it depends on the degree. I don't have a problem with a little troublemaking in the academy. At worst, Finchley will just tell me off.
But, this is the academy's dormitory, remember? And that means the housemother, Ohana, is keeping a close eye on us. If we make a scene and Ohana finds out, she'll kill us.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Just relax.
Ohana already knows all about it.
What?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I went out into the hallway and was caught in two seconds. But after I explained the situation to her, she forgave me. She said it was OK so long as the conductor agreed to accompany me as a supervisor and would take full responsibility.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
By the way, Ohana said you are to go to her room when the job is done.
She told me to make sure you came alone, even if armed.

This is the end. It's a death sentence.
It doesn't matter what happens from here on out.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
You look so sad and resigned.
I'll take that as a yes?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Come on, let's go to Vivi's room together. Vivi is out with Putra right now. She shouldn't be back anytime soon.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Heheh, let's go!
We're on our way to Vivi's room!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: And this is Vivi's room.
Bourse had said that we were going to break in, but she used a duplicate key, so we easily made our way in. I was too scared to ask her why she had a duplicate key.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: This is Vivi's first closet. It's a walk-in closet, but once inside there are many hidden doors that lead to the second through fifth closets.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: The Vivi doll dressed in the Sultry Bomber pieces will be set in the first closet so it is easy to find. Let's make it so that it'll be like it attacks her when she opens the door.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh?

Bourse, who was fishing through the closet,
noticed something and stopped in her tracks.

What's wrong?
Is there some kind of trap?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
There's an unopened shopping bag.
It says it's from Charm Chalet in St. Iris...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Ohh, that's right.
Vivi did say that a Charm Chalet store had opened in St. Iris.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
But this definitely isn't Vivi's size.
And there's a note inside.
Hey, hey, stop right there. It might be a present for someone. You shouldn't open things that belong to others without their permission.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It says, "To Bourse."

So, it's a present for Bourse.
I guess it's Bourse who's received a surprise tonight.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
She got me back.
I've made a big mistake...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Vivi is such a nice girl. She's kind even to someone as shady as me, and she doesn't force things no matter how bad I behave. She's a hero who always watches out for me.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I really can't compete with Vivi, can I?
I can't win no matter what I do.

Hugging the clothes and the "To Bourse" note,
she sat in front of the closet for a while, lost in thought.
I didn't want to interrupt this important moment, so I just stared at her profile...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh! Evening, Bourse!
What did you come here to steal tonight?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ahh!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Vivi!?
What are you doing here? I thought you were out drinking with Putra.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Wow, you reek of alcohol!
How much did you drink?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Heehee, enough to knock out Putra!
It was a bad idea to have Rennes come out with us.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Did you try to keep up with Rennes? You can't do that. The forest ranger of Brecheliant Forest doesn't get drunk on alcohol that decent people drink.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So that's why you're a lot drunker than usual...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh? The Conductor's here too? What are you doing in my closet with Bourse? If you're doing something naughty, you're meant to include me, you know?

It's nothing like that.
And seriously, you stink!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Hey, Conductor! What's with that doll? Were you using it instead of me?
That's no good! You've got to practice with the real thing!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Bourse
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's not like that, Vivi.
It was meant to be a surprise present for you.
Growing up in Verforet, east of Brecheliant, the energetic outdoorsy girl and the slightly insular, paranoid homebody are childhood friends who have been together all their lives.
I see. No wonder these two have a duplicate key to each other's rooms.
Likely having heard the commotion, Ohana appeared with a big smile on her face, grabbed both of them by the scruff of the neck and dragged them out.
No one saw the girls again after that.
